events.name: UK Inflation Hits New High in October Due to Rising Energy Costs
events.wd_label: UK Inflation Hits New High in October Due to Rising Energy Costs
events.wd_description: The UK's inflation rate rose to 11.1% in October, driven by soaring energy costs, as the economy slides into recession, with living costs sharply increasing despite government intervention.
events.description: The UK's inflation rate rose to 11.1% in October, driven by soaring energy costs, as the economy slides into recession, with living costs sharply increasing despite government intervention.

events.name: Inflation Increase
events.wd_description: The UK's annual inflation rate rose to 11.1% in October, up from 10.1% in September, marking a new high driven by rising energy and food prices.
events.description: The UK's annual inflation rate rose to 11.1% in October, up from 10.1% in September, marking a new high driven by rising energy and food prices.

events.name: Energy Price Surge
events.wd_description: Soaring gas and electricity prices, with gas prices rising nearly 130% and electricity by 66%, have significantly contributed to the sharp increase in the cost of living.
events.description: Soaring gas and electricity prices, with gas prices rising nearly 130% and electricity by 66%, have significantly contributed to the sharp increase in the cost of living.

events.name: Economic Recession Projection
events.wd_description: The UK economy is projected to remain in recession through the first quarter of 2024, as confirmed by recent data showing economic contraction in the third quarter.
events.description: The UK economy is projected to remain in recession through the first quarter of 2024, as confirmed by recent data showing economic contraction in the third quarter.

events.name: North Korea Denies Supplying Arms to Russia
events.wd_label: North Korea Denies Supplying Arms to Russia
events.wd_description: North Korea denied allegations made by the United States that it has supplied artillery shells to Russia for the war in Ukraine, stating that it has never engaged in arms dealings with Russia and has no plans to do so.
events.description: North Korea denied allegations made by the United States that it has supplied artillery shells to Russia for the war in Ukraine, stating that it has never engaged in arms dealings with Russia and has no plans to do so.

events.name: US Allegations
events.wd_description: The White House, through National Security Spokesperson John Kirby, alleged that North Korea is supplying Russia with a significant number of artillery shells for its war in Ukraine.
events.description: The White House, through National Security Spokesperson John Kirby, alleged that North Korea is supplying Russia with a significant number of artillery shells for its war in Ukraine.

events.name: North Korean Denial
events.wd_description: North Korea's Defense Ministry denied the US allegations, stating that the country has never engaged in arms dealings with Russia and has no plans to do so in the future.
events.description: North Korea's Defense Ministry denied the US allegations, stating that the country has never engaged in arms dealings with Russia and has no plans to do so in the future.

events.name: Context of Ukraine Conflict
events.wd_description: North Korea, one of the few countries to recognize the independence of breakaway Ukrainian regions, has supported Russia's annexation of parts of Ukraine.
events.description: North Korea, one of the few countries to recognize the independence of breakaway Ukrainian regions, has supported Russia's annexation of parts of Ukraine.

events.name: Liberation of Lyman by Ukrainian Troops
events.wd_label: Liberation of Lyman by Ukrainian Troops
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces liberated the key eastern city of Lyman, marking another military defeat for Russia, just after Russia had declared the city's annexation.
events.description: Ukrainian forces liberated the key eastern city of Lyman, marking another military defeat for Russia, just after Russia had declared the city's annexation.

events.name: Liberation of Lyman
events.wd_description: Ukrainian troops surrounded and captured Lyman, raising the national flag and celebrating their victory over Russian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian troops surrounded and captured Lyman, raising the national flag and celebrating their victory over Russian forces.

events.name: Russian Retreat
events.wd_description: Russia's ministry of defense acknowledged the retreat of its troops from Lyman, citing the need to move to "more advantageous lines."
events.description: Russia's ministry of defense acknowledged the retreat of its troops from Lyman, citing the need to move to "more advantageous lines."

events.name: Annexation Ceremony
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin declared Lyman and other regions as part of Russia during a ceremony in the Kremlin, despite the ongoing conflict.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin declared Lyman and other regions as part of Russia during a ceremony in the Kremlin, despite the ongoing conflict.

events.name: U.S. Efforts to Bolster Lithium Battery Production
events.wd_label: U.S. Efforts to Bolster Lithium Battery Production
events.wd_description: The Biden administration is pushing to bolster the U.S.'s lithium battery production capabilities to reduce reliance on foreign supply and increase energy self-sufficiency.
events.description: The Biden administration is pushing to bolster the U.S.'s lithium battery production capabilities to reduce reliance on foreign supply and increase energy self-sufficiency.

events.name: National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries
events.wd_description: The National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries outlines plans to invest in the lithium supply chain from mining to production, aiming to increase energy self-sufficiency and reduce reliance on foreign supply.
events.description: The National Blueprint for Lithium Batteries outlines plans to invest in the lithium supply chain from mining to production, aiming to increase energy self-sufficiency and reduce reliance on foreign supply.

events.name: Domestic Lithium Production Challenges
events.wd_description: The U.S. faces challenges in expanding domestic lithium production, including limited current production, reliance on foreign supply, and environmental and political hurdles.
events.description: The U.S. faces challenges in expanding domestic lithium production, including limited current production, reliance on foreign supply, and environmental and political hurdles.

events.name: Investment and Innovation Initiatives
events.wd_description: The Biden administration has announced investments and initiatives to boost domestic lithium production, including grants and partnerships with industry stakeholders.
events.description: The Biden administration has announced investments and initiatives to boost domestic lithium production, including grants and partnerships with industry stakeholders.

events.name: Li-Bridge Partnership
events.wd_description: Li-Bridge is a public-private partnership aiming to align the federal government's vision with the private sector to build the lithium supply chain and address bottlenecks.
events.description: Li-Bridge is a public-private partnership aiming to align the federal government's vision with the private sector to build the lithium supply chain and address bottlenecks.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: The blueprint includes plans to develop greater recycling capabilities to capture more useful battery minerals and achieve 90% recycling of consumer electronics, EV, and grid-storage batteries by 2030.
events.description: The blueprint includes plans to develop greater recycling capabilities to capture more useful battery minerals and achieve 90% recycling of consumer electronics, EV, and grid-storage batteries by 2030.

events.name: Innovative Battery Technologies
events.wd_description: Researchers are developing batteries with fewer critical minerals and alternative formulations to meet demand and reduce reliance on scarce resources.
events.description: Researchers are developing batteries with fewer critical minerals and alternative formulations to meet demand and reduce reliance on scarce resources.
